resources.string: Allow the application to collect information about your health from your smartwatch.
Inform your contacts of your safety when you leave the danger zone.
Orange has launched their safety check because of the following disaster in your area: %1$s. Inform your contacts that you are safe?

string-array.name: intro_description
string-array.item: Orange Safety Services is here if you need to contact emergency, or inform your close friends you are safe during a dangerous situation
The application requires access to your contact to inform them you are safe, and your health information to help in case of emergency.
The application uses SMP to bring advanced features such as managing your contacts automatically.
The application uses health information such as the heart rate from your Google Account. Press next and select your google account.
Click on the button in case you are in a situation that required emergency services.
